statements: SELECT * FROM educational_resources;
SELECT title, description FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book';
SELECT title, upload_date FROM educational_resources ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT resource_id, resource_type, course_id FROM educational_resources WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM educational_resources WHERE upload_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM educational_resources WHERE resource_type = 'Book';
SELECT title, description FROM educational_resources WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY upload_date DESC;
SELECT resource_id, title, course_id FROM educational_resources WHERE upload_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT DISTINCT(course_id) FROM educational_resources WHERE description LIKE '%tutorial%';
